channel.title: Increasing max hp of monsters + member stuff!
channel.description: 1)Somehow , KQ and KBD on my server have less than 50 HP (O.O) and I want to increase their maximum hp , where and how do I do that?? 2)I want to create a member shop , its not a problem to make a shop , but how do I make an item to be used by members only?? 3)How do I design a special character right (char right =5 or what ever) with a crown and all the other character right options for members??

item.title: Increasing max hp of monsters + member stuff!
item.dc:creator: @RedTapuah RedTapuah
item.description:
@RedTapuah wrote:

Thank you but I didn’t understand how to make an item that normal players cannot use![br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 23, 2009, 08:39:54 am[/size][hr]I wasn’t talking about making commands!
I need a tut which shows how to make 2 cases:
case 1 : if the character is a member he can wear the specific item
case 2 : if the caracter is not a member and then it sends a message : sorry , this item is for members only!

Read full topic
item.source: Increasing max hp of monsters + member stuff!

item.title: Increasing max hp of monsters + member stuff!
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

  1. Npc.cfg
  2. I know it has something to do with
player-ifMember = 1

Or something along those lines. Other than that, I am not quite sure.
3. Character rights can be anything you want them to be. You could make admin playerRights == 8 if you want it to be. Just make it so that all of your commands make it so that it includes whatever playerRight you want to add in. For example, for your master command,

if (command.startsWith("master") && playerRights > 1) {

That is saying that anyone with a playerRight value above 1 can use the command. 5 > 1.
As for crowns, that is client sided.

Read full topic
item.source: Increasing max hp of monsters + member stuff!
